title: Den/Study, Pilates Equipment, ATM Machine
posting_body: Welcome to gracious living in the grand European tradition in the heart of upbeat, downtown Los Angeles, offering skyline views of one of Americas most dynamic cities.
Eleven distinctive floor plans that were creatively designed and crafted with a wealth of detail giving you the perfect setting for your luxurious California lifestyle.
-Solid Hardwood Oak Doors with Electronic Key Entry
-Light, Airy Interiors with Nine Foot Ceilings
-Panoramic Skyline City Vistas or Courtyard Views
-Resident Lounge with Full Bar & Full Catering Kitchen
-24-hour Library/Study Room with High Speed Internet Access
-Three Private Computer Rooms with High Speed Internet Access
-Four Cybex Treadmills with Individual Flat-Screen TV's
-Beautiful Panoramic City Views from Many Vantage Points
-Separate Men's and Women's Saunas, Steam Showers, Dressing Areas, and Massage
Pricing and availability are subject to change.
